text: int main ( ) { int t , n , sum = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int a [ n ] , b [ n ] , i ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] ) ; } a [ n ] = a [ n - 1 ] + 1 ; b [ i ] = 0 ; sum = 0 ; for ( i = n - 1 ; i >= 0 ; i -- ) { if ( a [ i + 1 ] >= a [ i ] ) { b [ i ] = b [ i + 1 ] + 1 ; } else { b [ i ] = 1 ; } sum = sum + b [ i ] ; } printf ( "%d" , sum ) ; } return 0 ; }
